**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-07T22:08:23Z" title="07/07/2015 10:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 7, 2015</time> by Candlelight**
  
deletion

thx for the rework,

i had betterwarpspeed but if i was going in hyperwarp my rocket crushed ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) hopefully this one let my kerbals Live ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This will be useful for New Horizons definitely! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks for the support guys!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-24T20:04:14Z" title="05/24/2015 08:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 24, 2015</time> by Candlelight**
np, ill have to give it a test run when i get time

> 
> np, ill have to give it a test run when i get time

I gave it a test run myself, it works like a charm!

I don't know about you...
Need this mod but it causes the Kraken to appear on my ships as I come out of time warp after I've hit max warp.

> 
> Need this mod but it causes the Kraken to appear on my ships as I come out of time warp after I've hit max warp.

Will try to fix it, but it will be a bit harder for me as this is my first mod and my first maintained mod.
Radon86, thx for the effort mate

> 
> Radon86, thx for the effort mate

Thanks mate!

But on the down side, i left the project as you can see.Because, well...I lack the C# programming potential, which means i couldn't fix even the simplest of bugs.So why bother with it?

But on the UP side, i am tackling something grand that will take me a LOT of time to make.So until that day, patience will ensue.

Anyways, thanks mate for the support! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
